docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: TIMED to coincide with Black History Month, public television's ''Great Performances'' is presenting - tonight at 9 o'clock on Channel 13 -''Wolf Trap Salutes Dizzy Gillespie: An All-Star Tribute to the Jazz Master.'' The 90-minute special includes highlights from a concert performed last June before a full house at Wolf Trap Park Farm for the Performing Arts in Vienna,

docs.snippet: LEAD: THOSE who deal in antique collectibles know that old fishing gear, whether rods, reels, lures or even yellowing tackle catalogues, has become highly prized in recent years. To this, one may now add antique fish decoys, used, usually through ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THOSE who deal in antique collectibles know that old fishing gear, whether rods, reels, lures or even yellowing tackle catalogues, has become highly prized in recent years. To this, one may now add antique fish decoys, used, usually through a hole cut in the ice, to lure large fish within range of a spear.

headline.main: Weekend Show of Antique Fishing Gear

docs.snippet: LEAD: Oliver G. Swan, a literary agent whose career spanned almost 40 years, died of pneumonia yesterday at Bryn Mawr (Pa.) Hospital. He was 83 years old. Among the authors he represented were Conrad Richter, Richard Wright, Morris West, Alex Hail...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Oliver G. Swan, a literary agent whose career spanned almost 40 years, died of pneumonia yesterday at Bryn Mawr (Pa.) Hospital. He was 83 years old. Among the authors he represented were Conrad Richter, Richard Wright, Morris West, Alex Hailey and the estate of Henry James.

headline.main: Oliver Swan, 83, Literary Agent With Eye for Worthy Unknowns
